title: Fredrik Sterner
text: Fredrik Sterner (born 23 November 1978) is a Swedish <a href="snowboarding">snowboarder</a>. He competed in the <a href="Snowboarding%20at%20the%201998%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20halfpipe">men's halfpipe event</a> at the <a href="1998%20Winter%20Olympics">1998 Winter Olympics</a>.
